thread.title: 17 Bizarre Facts To Know Before You Visit Iceland
thread.title_full: 17 Bizarre Facts To Know Before You Visit Iceland

author: Michelle No
title: 17 Bizarre Facts To Know Before You Visit Iceland
text:
Prohibition, like smoking bans, was seen as progressive back in the day. ID: 10365042 14. Iceland has the highest swimming pool-to-human ratio in the world. View this image ›
jentong / Via instagram.com ID: 10356855 15. The country has no standing army . View this image ›
desireeanderson_ / Via instagram.com ID: 10356746 16. Iceland’s climate is actually not as cold as many people believe — the average winter temperature is 2°C, or 35°F. View this image ›
cultivatedwellbeing / Via instagram.com ID: 10365122 17. According to the latest World Happiness Report (published by the UN), Iceland is the third happiest country in the world. View this image ›
icelandtravel / Via instagram.com ID: 10356909 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
